title: Sex in Numbers
description: Get ready for a gritty, yet enthralling, rock star romance with enough suspense to keep you on edge. S.R. Watson and Shawn Dawson brings you a sexy alpha, submission, music, and twisted angst in this unique love story.The name is Diesel Beck and I’m a rock god…or so I’m told. When I get the mic in my hand, women fall to my feet. The sound of my voice is enough to make them crave me and my tool. Women line up for a chance to get into my bed—for a chance to claim me, but I can’t be tamed. My predilection is depraved and I offer no apologies. I rock hard and screw harder. I’ve never met a woman I couldn’t conquer …until her.Lourdes Drake walks into my life like a hurricane. She is the sister of my band mate Xander and she is going to be staying with us at the lake house this summer while we work on our music. Her darkness beckons me. I see through the image she desperately tries to project. She hates everything that I stand for, but she has no clue what I’m capable of. She is supposed to be off limits, but her rebellious nature makes my most sought after asset jump with excitement. Finally a challenge that I’m more than willing to accept. I will bend her to my will. I won’t stop until I have her complete submission.Get in and get out. That’s the challenge. My tool accepts.
author: S.R. Watson
